Package org.missions.objective.trigger.event.criteria.match.displayname

Class DisplayNameMatchesEventCriteria

java.lang.Object
org.missions.objective.trigger.event.criteria.match.displayname.DisplayNameMatchesEventCriteria
All Implemented Interfaces:
Category, EventCriteria
public class DisplayNameMatchesEventCriteria extends Object implements EventCriteria
This is the event criteria for if a display name matches to a specified string.
